description:
The NowServing app helps connect you to your doctors, so you can receive the healthcare that you deserve. 

The NowServing app (by SeriousMD) was originally built to help inform you about your queue position, so you can make the most of your time. Roam around the mall, finish chores, have some coffee and go back to the clinic when it’s almost your turn.

With the current situation the country is in, we've brought out a ton of new features to better keep both you and your doctors safe.

Today, the NowServing app also gives you a way to:
* Book a schedule with your doctor
* Chat with your doctor's staff to ask for schedules or ask minor questions
* You can be notified if the doctor is already IN and has started clinic
* You will be notified if the doctor cancelled the clinic due to an emergency
* You can now do online video consultations with your doctor
* Save transcripts of your online consult
* Have access to the prescriptions and other files sent to you by your doctor
* Receive your lab results from Hi-Precision
* Order medicines online and get it delivered straight to where you are

We've also partnered with companies like Hi-Precision, Medicard, MedExpress and more to offer you more convenience. 

We've worked hard to bring you this app and we're continuing to work day in and day out on updates to better improve the app. We hope it'll be able to help you and your family. Keep safe!

Say yes to better health! With the new iCare mobile app, you can do Telemed, request for MedCert, file for reimbursement, and request for a Letter of Authorization (LOA).

The iCare mobile app also covers a variety of features that will help you monitor and record important details and information about your health and your family members.

Build a healthier lifestyle with Elfie – the secure health super-app that rewards you for taking care of your wellbeing. 

Elfie is here to help, no matter what stage of life you’re in. Whether you’re managing a chronic condition, trying to conceive or just starting your health journey, Elfie gives you tools to track your progress and stay motivated – with period tracking, medication reminders to blood pressure and glucose monitoring, activity tracking, sleep insights and more. 

With expert-backed health programs, AI-powered coaching, and real rewards, Elfie helps you take control of your health, one habit at a time.

Recommended by Doctors Worldwide
Thousands of doctors, cardiologists and endocrinologists use and recommend Elfie to support better health outcomes. The app is currently part of global clinical studies, including Randomised Controlled Trials (RCTs) and Real-World Evidence (RWE) publications – proving its impact on medication adherence and lifestyle change.

Proven Results
Clinical trials and real-world studies show that regular Elfie users achieve measurable health improvements, from lower blood sugar and cholesterol to better medication adherence and quality of life. Elfie helps turn healthy routines into real results

Key Features

Women’s Health Tracking & Monitoring
• Period tracking allows you to understand changes in your cycle and how it impacts fertility
• Understand every stage of your cycle with AI insights
• BBT and Ovulation charts show you the best time to try and conceive
• Get pill and medication reminders for birth control
• Track your baby from conception through birth. Get health tips at every stage, even after birth

Medication Tracker with Digital Pillbox
• Get personalised medicine reminders and refill alerts
• Track over 4 million medications
• Follow your treatment plans and monitor adherence

Diabetes Management
• Log blood sugar (glucose) readings daily
• Understand what affects your HbA1c levels
• Get tips and trends to manage diabetes holistically

Blood Pressure & Heart Health
• Track blood pressure, cholesterol (HDL, LDL, Triglycerides), and angina symptoms
• Manage hypertension with data and insight
• Add lifestyle habits that support heart health

All-in-One Health Monitoring
• Custom plan tailored to your health goals 

Track key lifestyle areas:
• Nutrition and weight management
• Step count and physical activity
• Sleep quality
• Smoking cessation support
• Symptoms & quality of life tracker 

Earn Rewards for Healthy Habits
• Complete your daily plan, play quizzes and read health articles to earn coins
• Coins can be used for fun challenges, donated to charity or redeemed for rewards

AI-Powered Health Coach
Elfie connects the dots between your health data and behaviors to offer personalised recommendations. Understand your symptoms, improve your habits, and work towards long-term wellness.

Data Protection & Privacy
Your health data is secure. Elfie complies with the world’s strictest regulations: GDPR (EU), HIPAA (US), PDPA (Singapore), LGPD (Brazil), and KVKK (Turkey). We’ve appointed a dedicated Data Privacy Officer and built systems with full transparency and user control.

No Ads. No Upsells.
Elfie is ad-free and financially supported by healthcare partners like insurers, hospitals, and public health programmes to reduce the burden of chronic disease.

Download Elfie today
Start tracking your health in one simple, rewarding place. Whether you’re managing diabetes, taking medication, or just want to improve your lifestyle, Elfie helps you do it your way.

Disclaimer
Elfie is a wellness app designed to help you track health metrics and receive general lifestyle guidance. It is not intended for medical use, including the prevention, diagnosis, management, or monitoring of diseases. Please see our Terms of Use for details.

If you feel unwell, experience side effects, or need medical advice, always consult your doctor.

With over 2.8 million users across Southeast Asia, Doctor Anywhere (DA) is one of the region's fastest-growing healthcare companies, dedicated to providing quality care to you and your family.  Get the DA app now for trusted healthcare at your fingertips: 

SEE A DOCTOR 
> Consult a licensed doctor on-demand, via video call 
> Medicine delivery to your door
> Access your referrals, MCs and reports in-app

Suitable conditions for virtual consultation include:
- Cough, cold and flu/ influenza
- Stomach upset, digestive issues
- Diarrhea / constipation
- Allergies
- Headaches and migraines
- Eye infections
- Ear pain and infections
- UTI, vaginitis, yeast infections
- Eczema, psoriasis, rashes
- Depression, anxiety
- Birth control

CONNECT TO A SPECIALIST
Easily schedule an appointment and video-call a specialist directly through our app. Our team of experts includes dermatologists, psychologists, urologists, OB-GYNs, pediatricians, ENT specialists, and many more, ready to provide you with expert advice and care whenever you need it.

SHOP FOR EVERYDAY HEALTH ON DA MARKETPACE*
Discover a wide range of health and wellness products and services from leading brands, from healthy snacks and supplements, to health and wellness services. Enjoy free islandwide delivery on your purchases.

CORPORATE HEALTH BENEFITS
Make the most of your healthcare benefits! For those enrolled in a health insurance or plan, easily access your coverage, locate panel clinics, and explore member perks. 

SAFEGUARD YOUR HEALTH
Take a proactive approach to your well-being by scheduling regular health screenings and vaccinations. Choose from convenient in-clinic or home-based appointments to ensure you stay ahead of potential health issues.

PAYMENT METHODS
You can use PayNow (Singapore users) and credit or debit cards from local and international banks for video consultations, medication orders, health plan subscriptions, and topping up your DA Wallet for transactions at panel clinics and other app services. 
---

Note: Delivery areas and times for medicines may vary by country. This general overview of our app may not fully capture the user experience in all regions. Availability of healthcare services and features also differs depending on location.

Take charge of your healthcare with MediCard GO, a free mobile application that provides instant, easy access to your personal health needs.

This app replaces MACE and gives you the ability to request consultation or lab tests, securely speak to your doctor; schedule appointments; and access health coverage resources in an all-new, easy-to-use interface and navigation making it easier for you to get the information and care you need. So don't wait - download MediCard GO today and take control of your health!

MediCard GO App is a new mobile application that provides easier access to your personal health needs. This app gives you the ability to request consultation or lab tests, securely speak to your doctor; schedule appointments; and access health coverage resources in an all-new, easy-to-use interface and navigation. 

The beta test of this app is now live, and we're inviting users to take part and help us improve the experience. If you're looking for an easy way to take charge of your healthcare, the MediCard GO App is the perfect solution. 

Try it out today and let us know what you think by sending an email with your member code, screenshot or recording, device model and OS version to medicardgo_concerns@medicardphils.com.

-Access your healthcare within your fingertips (Present your Maxicare e-card quickly and easily)

-E-Wallet for your reimbursements (Conveniently claim reimbursement and transfer them to your e-wallet)
-Consult anytime, anywhere (Avail of video consultations with Maxicare Videoconsult powered by Doctor Anywhere)
-Get exclusive alerts (Be the first to receive the latest Maxicare wellness resources, news and promos)

Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today! 

Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development 
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets
► Pregnancy Week-by-Week Guides explain what to expect in each pregnancy week
► Simple & informative Pregnancy Timeline highlighting important milestones

Pregnancy Guides & Information
► In-depth Pregnancy Guides covering breastfeeding, exercise, food, twins & more 
► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse
► Daily Blog Posts with tips, tricks & helpful advice
► Upload photos in My Bump to create a visual pregnancy diary

Pregnancy Tools
► Pregnancy Due Date Calculator helps you work out when your bundle will arrive
► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity
► Pregnancy Weight Log helps you keep an eye on changes in your weight
► Contraction Timer measures contractions throughout your labour

Organise & Plan
► Pregnancy Calendar enables you to plan & document your prenatal appointments
► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby
► Birth Plan allows you to customise, organise & export your needs & wishes
► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy
► Search thousands of Baby Names for inspiration & share your favourites

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you. 
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail
► Watch guided pregnancy week-by-week walk-throughs
► Tap to see baby movements

Pregnancy Articles & Guides
If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.

Share your journey with friends & family
Our pregnancy tracker app can be personalised so your partner, future grandparents or best friend can join in the fun and follow your baby's development in the womb, from bump to birth! Keep everyone up to date with your pregnancy by inviting them to download the app today.

Follow us on Social Media
Facebook: facebook.com/PregnancyPlusApp
Instagram: @pregnancyplus

◆ Download Pregnancy+ App today ◆

Privacy Policy
https://info.philips-digital.com/PrivacyNotice?locale=en&country=GB

Terms of Use
https://info.philips-digital.com/TermsOfUse?locale=en&country=GB

This app is not intended for medical use, or to replace the advice of a trained medical doctor. Philips Consumer Lifestyle B.V. disclaims any liability for the decisions you make based on this information, which is provided to you on a general information basis only and not as a substitute for personalised medical advice. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, consult with your doctor or midwife.

The Pregnancy + tracker app wishes you a healthy, full-term pregnancy and a safe delivery.

Convenience. For You. By Generali.

Join the #1 Pregnancy & Baby Tracker App that’s Trusted by Millions for Week-by-Week Guidance and Baby Tracking Tools.

What to Expect is the world’s best-known baby development and growth tracker app chosen by more than 15 million parents. We’re the parenting, infant and family planning brand, offering you a free all-in-one pregnancy and baby tracker app with thousands of medically accurate articles, daily pregnancy updates, expert baby growth tracking, and personalized parenting tips to help you nurture a healthy pregnancy, a thriving baby, and confident parenting.

Find guides for every step of your growing family’s journey—from starting a family and recognizing early signs of pregnancy to navigating motherhood, newborn care, and the baby and toddler years. Find support and connection with moms, parents, and parents-to-be throughout your pregnancy journey.

During Pregnancy

* Due Date Calculator that determines your due date based on last period, IVF transfer, conception, and ultrasound, while sharing fun facts about your baby
* Week-by-week pregnancy tracker with info about baby development, symptoms and family preparation tips
* Themed baby size comparisons, visual countdown and 3D videos showing baby development in utero week by week of pregnancy
* Helpful daily tips designed to support you at every stage
* Keep track of your bump, symptoms, pregnancy weight, kick counts, birth plan and memories with our My Journal tool
* Expert-reviewed articles on signs of labor, pregnancy symptoms, baby and mom’s health and helpful tips
* Registry Builder to help you with your baby list and registry
* Detailed pregnancy and baby product reviews and expert buying guides
* Expecting Twins? Learn about different types of twins and possible fetal positions
* Use the contractions counter to track the frequency and duration of contractions

After Baby’s Arrival

* Baby Tracker that lets you time and track baby’s feedings, log pump sessions, diaper changes, tummy time, and more
* Month-by-month and milestone tracker for each step of your baby’s life, from the newborn to the toddler stage
* Daily tips tailored  to your baby’s age, stage, your postpartum recovery, and your parenting journey
* Record your postpartum symptoms and medications 
* Informative videos and articles about sleep schedules, feeding tips, milestones, and baby’s growth and week-by-week development
* Medically reviewed articles and info about baby’s health, doctor’s appointments and vaccines
* Join community groups meet people with due dates in the same month, newborn care, mom’s health conditions, parenting styles and more

Family Planning

* Ovulation Calculator that pinpoints your most fertile days based on last period and cycle
* Due Date Calculator that helps you figure out baby’s potential due date when you’re trying to conceive (TTC)
* Ovulation tracker and early pregnancy signs, plus keep a journal of your feelings when you’re trying to get pregnant
* Expert advice and articles to help you understand your cycle, signs of ovulation and pregnancy, fertility issues, adoption and surrogacy, and more
* Community groups devoted to preparing for pregnancy and fertility treatments

About Us 

All content on the What to Expect app is accurate, up-to-date, and reviewed by medical experts, including the What to Expect Medical Review Board. It aligns with current health guidelines and Heidi Murkoff’s trusted books 

Medical information comes from expert sources like ACOG, AAP, CDC, and peer-reviewed journals to ensure reliability and credibility.

For more about What to Expect's medical review and editorial policy, visit: https://www.whattoexpect.com/medical-review/
Do not sell my info: https://dsar.whattoexpect.com/

Use our pregnancy tracker app to help nurture a happy, healthy pregnancy & baby! Let’s connect:
* Instagram: @whattoexpect
* Twitter: @WhatToExpect
* Facebook: facebook.com/whattoexpect
* Pinterest: pinterest.com/whattoexpect
* TikTok: @whattoexpect

Easily manage your blood sugar, personalize your data analysis, and focus on your family and friends.

[Jurisdictional Statement]: This app is intended for use only within the European Union and Russia. Users in other regions or countries should ensure that their access to and use of the app complies with local laws and regulations before using it.

[Disclaimer]: This product only provides data collection and display and cannot be used as a basis for diagnosis. You must follow the advice of your doctor. If you misunderstand the content of the information or make an incorrect judgment about your situation, the consequences will be borne by the user.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.


We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.

It's the easiest way to manage and grow your practice without tons of paper and effort, no matter where you are in the Philippines.

*** Most downloaded Contraction Timer app in the world! Number 1 in the UK, USA, Australia, Canada, Italy and elsewhere! ***

This is the simplest-to-use contraction timer. The app will help to track your contractions and determine when it's time to go to the hospital.
If you plan on having a home birth, the app will tell you what stage of labor you are in at any given moment.

Keep track of your labor by tapping a single button at the start and at the end of each contraction. The Contraction Timer analyzes the duration and frequency of contractions and will notify you when it's time to go to the hospital.

Thousands of pregnant women around the world have become mothers using our app.

Always consult your doctor to orient yourself in terms of contraction frequency and duration.
This app is not a medical device and our recomendations are based on standard indicators. Your labor may occur differently. Therefore, do not rely exclusively on our app.
If the duration and frequency of contractions do not yet correspond to the necessary indicators but labor pains become unbearable, it is better to go to the hospital as soon as possible rather than give birth at home or on the way there. Trust what your body is telling you.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at neumandev@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important to us.

Get help with managing your diabetes, it's quick and easy!

Ranked the Top Diabetes App by Healthline 3 times. Featured in Forbes, TechCrunch, and The Washington Post.

Adding the mySugr Diabetes App to your daily routine with diabetes (Type 1, Type 2, or Gestational diabetes) will make your life easier. 

The mySugr diabetes app is your loyal and free diabetes logbook, which keeps your diabetes data under control. With one app you'll have:

• Easy and personalised dashboard (diet, meds, carb intake, blood glucose levels and more).
• Insulin/Bolus calculator with precise insulin dose recommendations (Limited to some countries using mySugr PRO).
• See clear blood sugar level graphs.
• Estimated HbA1c at a glance, no more surprises.
• Daily, weekly, and monthly reports, that you can share directly with your doctor.
• Secure data backup (built with regulatory compliance, quality, and safety).

Make diabetes suck less.

1. APP FEATURES
It auto-logs your data plus you can collect your daily therapy info such as meals, your diet and carb intakes. Also, medications you take, blood glucose levels and insulin levels.

2. INTEGRATIONS
• Steps, activity, blood pressure, CGM data, weight, and more.
Accu-Chek® Mobile (with the support of wireless adapter) (activate mySugr PRO for no charge! Please see our FAQ on the website for the latest information).

3. PRO FEATURES
Take your diabetes therapy to the next level! mySugr PRO can be activated at no charge with some Accu-Chek® devices or with a monthly or yearly paid subscription.
• Smart search: build your own searchable database of places, meals, activity, tags, etc.
• Insulin Calculator (check available countries): calculate your insulin dose, corrections, and meal shots.
• PDF & Excel reports: save or print all your data for you or your doctor.
• Blood glucose reminders: you won't forget to check and log.
• Meal photos: snap your meals to improve your carb counting.
• Basal rates: for pump users.

Get it now! A clear logbook to monitor, control and manage your diabetes: all your medical information right on your smartphone and ready to be used! Stay on top of your health, monitor your carbs, manage your medicine intake with Bolus Calculator (mySugr PRO), get help avoiding hypers/hypos, and be in control of your diabetes therapy every day!

SUPPORT:
We are always working to make the mySugr Diabetes App better, and we need your feedback! Have a problem, criticism, question, suggestion, or praise? 

Get in touch at:
• mysugr.com
• support@mysugr.com

https://legal.mysugr.com/documents/general_terms_of_service/current.html
https://legal.mysugr.com/documents/privacy_policy/current.html

When selecting a vascular access device, are you considering both the infusates and the potential infusion complications? Thrombosis, thrombophlebitis, phlebitis, necrosis following extravasation of a vesicant drug, and pain/redness during infusion may be potential complications. The BD Infusate Consideration Companion (ICC) may help you identify medications that are non-peripherally compatible. Consideration of peripheral vein preservation and minimizing harm should be a factor in device selection. Selecting the appropriate device for a patient is a critical part of a clinician’s job. These materials are being provided for your information only and are not a substitute for clinical judgment.

From the developer of 'Read by QxMD', 'The ECG Guide' and 'Pedi STAT' comes 'Calculate', a next-generation clinical calculator and decision support tool, freely available to the medical community.

"We recommend medical users try the free Calculate by QxMD first..."
-from iMedicalApps review "The best free Medical Calculator apps for the iPhone"

'Calculate' highlights tools which impact clinical practice either by simplifying diagnosis, clarifying treatment options or displaying prognosis.

Helping you make decisions, not just calculate numbers...

Features

• Developed by a collaboration of clinician experts from diverse backgrounds
• Point-of-care tools in the areas of cardiology, internal medicine, primary care, nephrology, hematology, hepatology, gastroenterology, emergency medicine, oncology, orthopedics, critical care/ICU, ENT, radiology, rheumatology, mental health, respirology, neurology, pediatrics, infectious disease, neurosurgery, general surgery, vascular surgery, and obstetrics.
• Converts recent research publications into practical handheld tools - knowledge translation at its best 
• Automatically adapts to your clinical practice
• Unique ‘Question Flow’ technology gets you answers, fast
• Detailed references with PubMed & Read integration
• Comprehensive and insightful results
• Elegant design and intuitive interface
• SI and Imperial units

More than 200 unique calculators and decision support tools

While too extensive to list them all, here is a small sampling of included content:

Guide treatment

• Determine cardiovascular risk using ACC/AHA, Framingham, Gupta and VQI Cardiac Risk Index
• CHADS2 & CHA2DS2-VASc to guide treatment in atrial fibrillation
• Understand bleeding risk in atrial fibrillation using HAS-BLED & OBRI
• TIMI risk score in ACS
• CIWA in alcohol withdrawal
• Rule of 9s & Parkland formula in burns
• Water deficit in hypernatremia 
• Timing of surgery with Aortic Stenosis Risk Score
• Risk stratify pneumonia (CURB-65, PORT)
• NIH Stroke Scale in acute stroke
• Imaging in possible subarachnoid hemorrhage with Ottawa SAH Rule

Determine Prognosis

• Cirrhosis (MELD, Child-Pugh)
• Chronic Kidney Disease (Kidney Failure Risk Equation)
• Heart failure
• Lymphoma (NCCN-IPI, IPI24, R-IPI)
• Myelodysplastic Syndrome (IPSS-R, WPSS)
• Myeloma (ISS, R-ISS)
• Hemodialysis
• COPD (Bode)
• Pancreatitis (BISAP, Ranson's)
• Cardiac surgery (Euroscore II, Cleveland Clinic, Mehta)
• Critical care (APACHE II, SOFA)
• Neurologic outcome (DRAGON, CAM-ICU, modified Rankin, FOUR score, Hunt & Hess)

Calculate

• Ideal body weight, BMI and BSA
• Due date and gestational age
• Extensive formula used in echocardiography and invasive hemodynamic monitoring
• Kt/V in dialysis patients
• eGFR with CKD-EPI, MDRD & Schwartz
• A-a gradient

Classify

• Angina (CCS)
• Congestive heart failure (NYHA)

Screen

• Diabetes
• Breast cancer

Reduce and predict perioperative complications

• WHO Surgical Safety Checklist
• Predictive models for cardiac surgery, vascular surgery and coronary angiography
• Postoperative Respiratory Failure Risk score

Manage

• Head, neck, ankle and knee injuries (NEXUS, Ottawa ankle/knee, Canadian C-spine and CT head rules)
• DVT and PE (PERC, Wells, PESI)
• Pulmonary nodules
• TIA (ABCD2)

Stage

• Lung cancer
• Renal cell carcinoma
• Head & neck cancers

Understand

• TTKG in hypokalemia and hyperkalemia
• Dermatomes

Diagnose

• Heparin Induced Thrombocytopenia
• Infective Endocarditis
• ARDS
• Autoimmune Hepatitis
• Sleep disorder (Epworth Sleepiness Scale)

And much, much more...

Founded my medical professionals, QxMD Software is dedicated to creating high quality, point-of-care tools for practicing health care professionals. My Baby Heart Sounds is a quick and easy way to use your iPhone to listen, record and share your baby's heart sounds.

Not too long ago, we were pregnant mothers too. While our partners enjoyed listening to our babies' sounds by placing their ears on the tummy, we wanted to capture and share these precious audio-memories ourselves. We tried voice memo apps and other sound-recording apps but felt that there was something more we could do to improve the quality of the sound in a simple setup. Fast forward a couple years and here we are!

Why should you try this app?

- Minimum time to setup. All you need is your iPhone. Simple instructions are provided within the app and we are here to support you all the way.
- High quality sound. Using advanced audio signal processing techniques, we deliver a high quality audio experience that allows you to distinguish your baby's heart sounds. For best results use AirPods.
- Listen for free and only pay when you want to record and share.
- Secure. All recordings are stored on your phone. We do not have any access to your recordings. You decide how you would like to share your recordings.
- Track your pregnancy journey. Get weekly insights on pregnancy symptoms, learn how to read ultrasound scans, monitor contractions, and keep track of your baby’s movements with a kick counter.

For best results:

- Use the app when you are 20-30 weeks or greater pregnant.
- Use the app in a quiet room
- Remove any phone case/shell/cover (the iPhone needs to touch your skin to be able to pick up the sounds)
- Put the phone in Airplane Mode
- Start the app and place the iPhone on your tummy to listen for a clear sound. You may need to try a few different spots. Press "Record" to create a recording
- Use AirPods

My Baby Heart Sounds Disclaimer:

- The My Baby Heart Sounds app is NOT a Medical Device or application. It is NOT in any way suitable for medical opinion, advice or diagnosis, and it is NOT intended to provide any information about the person of use's wellbeing or health.
- The app does NOT backup recordings automatically outside the user's device. It is the user's responsibility to regularly backup their recordings.

- Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase
- You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase
- Your subscription will renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
- The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period
- When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto-renewal will be disabled, but the current subscription will not be refunded

mWell PH:24/7 Doctor Consult, mWellness Score, fitness, nutrition programs + more
Kamusta ka? How are you today?

mWell, the digital healthcare arm of Metro Pacific Investments Corporation, is the Philippines' first fully integrated, fully digital health and wellness app.
We're with you in every step of your wellness journey —
whether you need online doctor consultations or want to reach your health and fitness goals.
As the Philippines’ healthcare mega app, we will continue to develop new features to respond to your ever-evolving healthcare needs.

Consult Now: Doctors are on-call 24/7
Consult with a doctor in three minutes or less. Get medical certificate and e-prescription right after the consultation.

Consult Later
Book an appointment with your preferred doctor. Family doctors, specialists and mind health experts are available at your convenience.

Mind Health
Reduce stress and anxiety, keep calm, and become productive with help from our psychiatrists, clinical psychologists, and counselors. Improve your mind health and wellbeing.

Fitness
Access daily workout programs-- from basic weight loss, getting lean and toned to specialized programs such as diabetes management, pre-natal, and post-baby workouts.

Food & Nutrition
Discover calorie-controlled recipes by nutritionists and dietitians. Try our healthy yet flavorful recipes. This feature is ideal for anyone with special dietary requirements.

mWellness Score
Track your wellness level right from your mWell app! A PH first and exclusive, the mWellness Score measures daily physical activity, sedentary behavior, and sleep, allowing you to live healthier. mWellness Score monitors your overall fitness level by using your physical activity data from your connected fitness tracker or the Apple Health app.

Home Care
Avail of expert care for loved ones at home through mWell’s partnership with HealthLink. This includes basic care support, cardiac care, elderly care, and post-stroke care.

Emergency
Accidents happen in a split second. To protect against life’s uncertainties, access to an ambulance is now just a tap away on the mWell app through ties with Lifeline 16-911—the Philippines’ premiere emergency quick response provider.

Advocacy
mWell is committed to making healthcare accessible, available, and affordable to anyone, anytime, anywhere. Learn more about advocacy programs designed to bring healthcare closer to those who need it most.

Shop
Find health and wellness products and services-- mWellness Wearables, insurance packages, Home Care services, Emergency Response and more on the e-shop.
